description: Add a dedicated Constraints inspector section for eligible nodes in `DesignerShell`
Introduce reference-node UI state in `DesignerShell` for two-node constraint authoring
Implement `Set As Reference` and `Clear Reference` controls with visible reference status
Add guardrails that disable constraint actions when reference/target selection is invalid
Wire `align-left` action from inspector controls to `addConstraint` store action
Wire `align-top` action from inspector controls to `addConstraint` store action
Wire `match-width` action from inspector controls to `addConstraint` store action
Wire `match-height` action from inspector controls to `addConstraint` store action
Normalize pair-constraint keying to prevent duplicate constraints for same relation and node pair
Block unsupported pair-constraint combinations (self-reference, cross-parent pairs, document/page nodes, missing nodes)
Apply default pair-constraint strength policy (`strong`) for newly-authored constraints
Render a list of constraints involving the selected node in inspector
Support removing listed constraints directly from inspector
Display counterpart node names and relation labels for each constraint row
Unify existing aspect-ratio lock controls into the constraints section without behavior regression
Add canvas visual treatment for active reference node
Add canvas visual treatment for constrained counterpart nodes in selected-node context
Improve constraint conflict messaging in inspector using `constraintError` with recovery guidance
Ensure pair-constraint add/remove operations participate correctly in undo/redo history
Ensure workspace export/import continues to serialize and rehydrate pair constraints authored via UI
Add keyboard-operable controls for reference and pair-constraint actions
Add stable automation IDs for constraints section controls, list rows, and action buttons
Prevent regressions in preset insertion and fit-to-contents workflows when pair constraints are present
Implement an end-to-end designer flow for authoring, persisting, and editing pair constraints
Enable jump-to-counterpart behavior from each constraint row to select/focus the related node
Auto-prune dangling constraints when a referenced node is deleted
